string-array.name: ProbDesc
string-array.item: Complain here issues related to Water facilities
Complain here issues related to Sanitory
Complain here issues related to Mess
Complain here issues related to Electricity and Electrical Applainces
Complain here issues related to Internet Facility

string-array.name: ProbDetails
string-array.item: If you have any problems related to water i.e. TDS,Salts,Filters etc , Complain it Directly using our app to reach the concerned authorities"
If you have any problems related to cleanliness i.e. Waste Disposal,Dustbins etc , Complain it Directly using our app to reach the concerned authorities"
If you have any problems related to Mess i.e. Food,Behaviour of Workers etc , Complain it Directly using our app to reach the concerned authorities"
If you have any problems related to Electricity i.e. Uneven PowerCuts,Circuit problems etc , Complain it Directly using our app to reach the concerned authorities"
If you have any problems related to Internet i.e. LAN Connectivity,Slow Surfing etc , Complain it Directly using our app to reach the concerned authorities"

string-array.name: HostelDetails
string-array.item: Hostel 1 known by PARIJAT hostel basically have students of MNIT from 1st and 2nd Year. It has a Badminton court, a Volleyball court and two lawns with a Cycle Stand.
Hostel 2 known by CHAITANYA hostel basically have students of MNIT from 2nd Year. It has a Badminton court, a Volleyball court and two lawns with a Cycle Stand.
Hostel 3 known by SATPURA hostel basically have students of MNIT from 3rd Year and 4th Year. It has a Badminton court, a Volleyball court and two lawns with a Cycle Stand.
Hostel 4 known by LOHIT hostel basically have students of IIIT KOTA from 2nd Year. It has a Badminton court, a Canteen and two lawns with a Cycle Stand.
Hostel 5 known by BRIHASPATI hostel basically have students of MNIT from 3rd Year. It has a Badminton court, a Laundry and two lawns with a Cycle Stand.
Hostel 6 known by KABIR hostel basically have students of MNIT and IIIT from 1st Year. It has a Badminton court and a Volleyball court.
Hostel 7 known by DRONA hostel basically have students of MNIT from 1st Year. It has a Badminton court, a Volleyball court and a lawn with a Cycle Stand.
Hostel 8 known by VARUN hostel basically have students of IIIT from 3rd Year and 4th Year. It has a Badminton court, a Volleyball court and two lawns with a Cycle Stand.
